page.title: 10A Typical Working Mum's Day.
page.content: At 7.15am.{I get up}and make the packed lunches. The family get their own breakfast. I wash dishes, make beds and shower. A short car journey gets us to the{Y.M.C.A.}Community Centre where I work with my husband. I see the children to school, then I start. My day varies according to the programme but each morning I oversee the coffee bar; buying and making food to be sold, and supervising any volunteers. Some days I have special lunches to prepare. I see people, make telephone calls and organise{publicity for new clubs or{fund raising} activities. Occasionally I supply teach locally. We return home between 5 and 8 o'clock. I make dinner, tidy up, read, write or watch television. Sometimes I go to a meeting or take the children to a club. I fall asleep around midnight.
